refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the version of the MaxDB server

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns a string representing the version of the MaxDB server that the MaxDB extension is connected to (represented by the link parameter).

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.returnvalues;
A character string representing the server version.

refsect1.title: Example

example.title: Procedural style
example.programlisting:
<?php
$link = maxdb_connect("localhost", "MONA", "RED");

/* check connection */
if (maxdb_connect_errno()) {
   printf("Connect failed: %s\n", maxdb_connect_error());
   exit();
}

/* print server version */
printf("Server version: %s\n", maxdb_get_server_info($link));

/* close connection */
maxdb_close($link);
?>
